newUserText:
Hi! Did you hear your intro?
 You can update it by replying to this message with the following command:
    `!tada set intro <introname>` 
 Where <introname> can be listed be running `!tada get intro all`

If you do not want an intro to play when you join voice channels then use: `!tada disable`
helpText: The following is a list of all commands available:
